bill.summary:
Providing Our Law Enforcement with Adequate Resources for a Response Act or the POLAR Response Act
This bill includes a polar vortex as a major disaster for which a declaration of a state of emergency can be made and provides a definition for a disaster-related emergency for purposes of the Department of Defense (DOD) excess personal property program (therefore authorizing DOD to transfer certain personal property for a polar vortex emergency).
